During my freshmen year in college, I took on the challenge of directing and organizing the IEEE R&D Program. I led 10 freshmen students, such as myself to develop research projects that would impact the student community
The program itself has the objective to allow all students to become part of a research group from the beginning of their college career
Designed algorithm for autonomous navigation of maritime robot using machine vision and digital sensors
Worked on communication interface between Raspberry Pi 3, Arduino for motor control and navigation
Worked with multidisciplinary group of students with different project roles
Was chosen from a group of students to become part of a program aimed to prepare freshmen to become leaders among students while thriving professionally and academically
